rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {APG5691}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {APG5885}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}

description: This unit will complement APG5690 Advanced Translation and follows on from APG5874 Practice of Conference Interpreting and translation. In this unit, students will be exposed to further training in consecutive interpreting, simultaneous interpreting and sight translation/interpretation, as well as theory of Interpreting Studies applied to conference contexts.
